PAD_Minsc_OnlyWhenCooked.synopsis: One shot voicebark in the Lower City. One origin character remarks something while passing through an area, then three other origins may respond to that remark. The respondents are prioritized from top to bottom. If none of the respondents are available, this won't play.
PAD_Minsc_OnlyWhenCooked.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to S_LOW_OneShotVB_Minsc_OnlyWhenCooked_Trigger_325f99d9-e33b-4e2c-b00f-94866d698504 near the Sahuagin attack beach/Lower City entrance waypoint, with the initiator + one the respondents in your party

PAD_Minsc_WizardlyBeards.synopsis: One shot voicebark in the Lower City. One origin character remarks something while passing through an area, then three other origins may respond to that remark. The respondents are prioritized from top to bottom. If none of the respondents are available, this won't play.
PAD_Minsc_WizardlyBeards.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to S_LOW_OneShotVB_Minsc_WizardlyBeards_Trigger_2081b23b-f7ff-4897-88cc-4cd534e2fede on the street near Figaro's shop with the initiator + one the respondents in your party

PAD_Minsc_OnlyWhenCooked_1.speaker: Minsc
PAD_Minsc_OnlyWhenCooked_1.text: |Smells like fish. I like fish, but only when cooked.|

PAD_Minsc_OnlyWhenCooked_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Minsc_OnlyWhenCooked_0.text: Duly noted. If I ever make it to the Blade Kingdoms, I'll fetch you some singing fish. Simmered in wine, served with orange rind - you'd think you'd reached an eighth heaven.

PAD_Minsc_FighterNotLover_1.speaker: Minsc
PAD_Minsc_FighterNotLover_1.text: Sorry if you heard me and Boo arguing. He says to love is better than to fight, and I cannot agree!

PAD_Minsc_FighterNotLover_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Minsc_FighterNotLover_0.text: Hm - think of love as a strong ale or a warm fire. Is the clang of steel on steel not made more satisfying by the pleasures that come after?

PAD_Minsc_GiantSpaceHamsters_1.speaker: Minsc
PAD_Minsc_GiantSpaceHamsters_1.text: The githyanki must meet many giant space hamsters, but I bet they have ever seen one as small as Boo!

PAD_Minsc_GiantSpaceHamsters_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Minsc_GiantSpaceHamsters_0.text: |I think I read about them in a book before.|

PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_1.speaker: Minsc
PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_1.text: Beg pardon. But there is naught so bracing as a good battle-roar, do you not agree?

PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_3.speaker: Player
PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_3.text: Let me give it a try. RRaaaghRGRGGRGH!
PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_3.context: NodeContext: Wyll: An attempt at a battle roar, but rather funny.

PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_2.speaker: Minsc
PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_2.text: Oho, Boo - a challenge! I cannot let this go unanswered. One... two...

PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_0.speaker: Minsc
PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_0.text: *SQUEAK!* Ai, Boo, come now. See how our friend trembles? You have taken the jest too far.
PAD_Minsc_RoaringContest_0.context: NodeContext: You were braced to demonstrate a great battle-roar, but Boo got there first. You believe his was far TOO frightening.

PAD_Minsc_WizardlyBeards_2.speaker: Minsc
PAD_Minsc_WizardlyBeards_2.text: Minsc has heard that a mage must go thick-bearded, so all his wisdom might live in one place. Yet our company is more of the wisp and whiskers, no...?

PAD_Minsc_WizardlyBeards_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Minsc_WizardlyBeards_0.text: You assume too much, my good ranger.

PAD_Minsc_WizardlyBeards_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Minsc_WizardlyBeards_1.text: Laeral Silverhand is one of the great wizards of any land, and her face is fair and smooth as you'd ever see.
